Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Socialize \So"cial*ize\, v. t. 1. To render social. [1913 Webster]
2. To subject to, or regulate by, socialism. [1913 Webster]

socialize v 1: take part in social activities; interact with others; "He never socializes with his colleagues"; "The old man hates to socialize" [syn: {socialise}] 2: train for a social environment; "The children must be properly socialized" [syn: {socialise}] 3: prepare for social life; "Children have to be socialized in school" [syn: {socialise}] 4: make conform to socialist ideas and philosophies; "Health care should be socialized!" [syn: {socialise}]
